Config.Name: Jellyfin - URL
Config.Description: Internal URL to your Jellyfin server.

Config.Name: Jellyfin - Public URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Public URL to your Jellyfin server. Defaults to the internal URL if not set.

Config.Name: Jellyfin - Use Watchlist
Config.Description: Set to true to use Watchlist instead of Favorites

Config.Name: Use Secure Cookies
Config.Description: Set to true if accessing Swiparr over HTTPS

Config.Name: Admin Username
Config.Description: (Optional) A Jellyfin username that will always have admin privileges.

Config.Name: Auth Secret
Config.Description: Random string (min 32 chars). Generated automatically if not set.

Config.Name: Internal Database Path
Config.Description: Internal path to database. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Port
Config.Description: Internal port Swiparr listens on. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Internal Host
Config.Description: Internal host Swiparr binds to. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: X-Frame Options
Config.Description: X-Frame-Options header. Set to DISABLED to remove.

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Path to the application data folder
